name: II. Data Description and Preparation
content:
Data Description

The project integrates multiple datasets:

1.Transaction Data (basket-level):

  • Fields: household_key, BASKET_ID, DAY, PRODUCT_ID, QUANTITY, SALES_VALUE, STORE_ID, RETAIL_DISC, TRANS_TIME, WEEK_NO, COUPON_DISC, COUPON_MATCH_DISC.
  • Type: Primarily numerical and categorical.
  • Granularity: Basket/transaction level for each household.

2.Campaign Description:

  • Fields: DESCRIPTION, CAMPAIGN, START_DAY, END_DAY.
  • Defines campaign timelines and types.

3.Product Data (product_trunc):

  • Fields: PRODUCT_ID, MANUFACTURER, DEPARTMENT, BRAND, COMMODITY_DESC, SUB_COMMODITY_DESC, CURR_SIZE_OF_PRODUCT.
  • Provides categorical and descriptive information on products.

4.Household Demographics:

  • Fields: AGE_DESC, MARITAL_STATUS_CODE, INCOME_DESC, HOMEOWNER_DESC, HH_COMP_DESC, HOUSEHOLD_SIZE_DESC, KID_CATEGORY_DESC, household_key.
  • Categorical and ordinal variables describing households.

5.Coupon Data (coupon_trunc):

  • Fields: COUPON_UPC, PRODUCT_ID, CAMPAIGN.
  • Links coupons to products and campaigns.

6.Campaign-Household Mapping:

  • Fields: DESCRIPTION, household_key, CAMPAIGN.
  • Tracks household participation in campaigns.

Time Period: Multiple weeks of transaction-level data, aligned with campaigns.

Granularity: Household and basket-level.

Data Preparation

Key steps include:

1.Data Cleaning:

  • Handle missing demographic attributes (e.g., unknown household income).
  • Address outliers in sales values and quantities.

2.Feature Engineering:

  • Calculate household-level features such as average basket size, coupon redemption rate, discount sensitivity, campaign participation rate, product category preferences.
  • Encode categorical variables (e.g., income, age group) into numeric representations.
  • Aggregate transaction data into weekly or monthly purchase summaries.

3.Data Transformation:

  • Normalize skewed variables (e.g., sales values).
  • Create dummy variables for categorical features such as brand, department, and campaign type.
